# Security Policy

:construction: since this project is still in development, we can only apply security changes to the development version right now.

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.x.x   | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you found any (possible) security vulnerabilities, please email the lead maintainer at mail@elanum.de.
